entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Elk Island National Park 12:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
